rows.label: qst201902_msg0001
rows.name:
The boutique of that black-feathered
fool should be in this general- Oh...?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0002
rows.name:
Seems like there's a problem.
I wonder what's up?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0003
rows.name:
Indeed. We shall enquire as to the
nature of their predicament.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0004
rows.name:
What is the matter? We cannot help
but note that you seem beleaguered.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0005
rows.name: May we assist you?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, thank you. Well, we were hoping
to claim back some money from
a Nopon...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0007
rows.name:
You too have fallen foul of the
feathered felon? Speak.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0008
rows.name: All right...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0009
rows.name:
There's a Nopon merchant around here
called Suisui. He said he knew a quick,
easy way to turn 1,000G into 10,000.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0010
rows.name:
He asked me if I was on board. Said it
wouldn't take more than a few days.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0011
rows.name:
I gave him the money. Some days
passed, but I still hadn't heard back.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0012
rows.name:
That didn't seem right, so I went to
the shop to see what was up, but there
was no one in.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0013
rows.name:
When I asked around, I discovered that
Suisui had closed down his shop and
packed up a few days earlier.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0014
rows.name: So now I'm at a loss...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0015
rows.name:
I won't be able to afford food for my
daughter at this rate. I just don't know
what we should do now...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0016
rows.name:
Looks like they fell for a scam. They
took the money and ran...

rows.label: qst201902_msg0017
rows.name: That good-for-nothing!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0018
rows.name:
Not content with conning us, now he's
willing to trick an innocent mother
and child just to line his pocket?!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0019
rows.name:
Whether the law permit, such a vile
deed as this shall not go unpunished!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0020
rows.name:
Rex! Relinquish 10,000G to this poor
woman at once!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0021
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0022
rows.name: Why me?!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0023
rows.name: Why do you look so surprised?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0024
rows.name:
Ultimately, we will wrest back our
million from that ne'er-do-well.

rows.label: qst201902_msg0025
rows.name:
A paltry sum such as this will hardly
break the bank now, will it?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0026
rows.name:
Uh, sure, but isn't 10,000 a bit much?
1,000G would be enough, wouldn't it?

rows.label: qst201902_msg0027
rows.name:
Imbecile! We took you to be a man
large of heart! Show some compassion!

rows.label: qst201902_msg0028
rows.name: Hey, come on!
